properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devaa nee mukhamunu naaku Daachakumu naa prabhuvaa Nee sevakuni kopamuche Throsi veyaku Yehovaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devaa naa rakshana kartha neeve naa sahayudavu Nannu diganaada valadu nannu viduvakumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naadu thalidandrulu nannu vidichinanu Naa devundagu Yehovaa nannu cheradeeyunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naapai lechi yunnaru abadda saakshulu kroorul Nannappaginchaku devaa naadu virodhulaku{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehovaa daya pondedanu sajeevula deshamuna Itti nammakamuleni yedala ne nemagudunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dhairyamu thechukoni nibbara hrudayamu galgi Yehovaa devuni koraku kanipettukoni yundumu{/lang-eng}
